about.details:
Incorporated in 2002, Jungle Camps India operates wildlife camps and hotels, motels, inns, guest houses, holiday homes, health clubs, catering houses, and restaurants in India.

The company is a conservation-focused hospitality group that operates four award-winning boutique resorts in prime wildlife and tiger reserve national parks across central India. In addition to these resorts, the group manages a highway retreat and a restaurant and offers a variety of customized travel experiences.

The company owns and operates 87 rooms, including villas, cottages, deluxe rooms, and safari tents. Its amenities include banquet halls, meeting rooms, restaurants, bars, cafes, swimming pools, and spa facilities.

The Group owns and operates boutique luxury wilderness resorts at these four locations:

  1. Pench Jungle Camp, Pench National Park, Madhya Pradesh, and
  2. Rukhad Jungle Camp, Rukhad, Seoni District, Madhya Pradesh
  3. Tadoba Jungle Camp, Bhamdeli Village, Chandrapur District, Maharashtra
  4. Jungle Camp Kanha, Santapur Village, Balaghat District, Madhya Pradesh.

The Group operates two highway venues:

  1. Bison Highway Retreat - Rukhad, District Seoni, Madhya Pradesh (Motel and Restaurant).
  2. Midway Treat- Deur Kothar, District Rewa, Madhya Pradesh (Restaurant).

The company has a total of 162 employees.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Experienced promoters and an experienced management team
  • Robust processes and scalable model, supported by an experienced team
  • Strategic locations
  • Focus on the needs of guests
  • Creation of local jobs

faqs.question: What is the Jungle Camps India IPO?
faqs.answer:
Jungle Camps India IPO is a SME IPO of 4086400 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹29.42 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹72 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on December 10, 2024, and closes on December 12, 2024.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Jungle Camps India IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Jungle Camps India IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Jungle Camps India IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Jungle Camps India IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Jungle Camps India IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Jungle Camps India IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Jungle Camps India IPO opens on December 10, 2024 and closes on December 12, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Jungle Camps India IPO?
faqs.answer: Jungle Camps India IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,15,200.

faqs.question: How to apply for Jungle Camps India IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Jungle Camps India IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Jungle Camps India IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Jungle Camps India IPO will be done on Friday, December 13, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, December 16, 2024. Check the Jungle Camps India IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Jungle Camps India IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Jungle Camps India IPO listing date is on Tuesday, December 17, 2024.
